title: Revert the absurd AP ratio nerf on Karma's Q.
body: There's no reason for a mage to have only 40% AP ratio on her single wave clear ability. Even assassins and some supports have better wave clear than Karma and they supposed to have bad wave clear.

replies.body: Sure, if her abuse situations in top were to get fixed. Sure, Klepto will get removed, but that wont stop her from just going aery and endlessly poke melees out.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xNBbAFcy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-12T17:54:51.736+0000)
>
> Sure, if her abuse situations in top were to get fixed. Sure, Klepto will get removed, but that wont stop her from just going aery and endlessly poke melees out.

Doesn't Karma top have icegauntlet/spirit visage as her core build? Meaning she builds almost no AP. This change hurts AP karma mid and support more, does it not?

Don't you think there are better ways to nerf karma top (Nerf % hp healing on W, for example) than nerfing her AP ratios?

I mean, the easist way to fix Karma top is change her W heal and lower the base damages of her Q and RQ. She should have to build AP to deal damage, not be gifted it on a silver platter. Thats why I dont want the ratio going up until that gets fixed.

As for nerfing her top the right way, ask the balance team. Last time I checked it took them almost half the season to correctly nerf Riven once.
People complain damage supports shouldnt be a thing yet people want to buff the damage on a champion who can build full tank but still half health you top with one q at 15 mins

If she can build full tank and half you,
then her base damage is the problem, not the ratios.

There is no point in gutting mid Karma because top Karma is too strong.
PS: As an avid Karma fan for 7 seasons I'd like to say: I despise tank Karma.

Or even better, bring her back to the drawing board. A mage that really has only one damaging ability will need to have said ability deal absurd amount of damage in order to be viable. Remember release Zoe? No one liked release Zoe.

No one likes Zoe in general.
A burst mage with access to true damage is just a bad idea. With pretty much no kills and only Ludens, she can deadass half health chunk anyone with MR or not with E Q. Thats not healthy.
I agree, but this should wait for the support item changes to settle down first.
